p: Omacetaxine mepesuccinate (trade names Synribo), formerly named as homoharringtonine ( 16), is a plant alkaloid derived from Cephalotaxus fortunei Hook that was approved by the US FDA in October 2012 for the treatment of chronic myeloid leukemia in adults. Homoharringtonine has been reported to exhibit potent inhibitory activity against coronaviruses, namely porcine epidemic diarrhea virus, murine hepatitis virus (Dong et al. 2018; Andersen et al. 2019), and SARS-CoV-2 with EC 50 at 2.10 μM (Choy et al. 2020).
